{{cpp/title|put_money}}
{{cpp/io/manip/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=iomanip|since=c++11|1=
template&lt; class MoneyT &gt;
/*unspecified*/ put_money( const MoneyT&amp; mon, bool intl = false );
}}

When used in an expression {{c|out &lt;&lt; put_money(mon, intl)}}, converts the monetary value {{c|mon}} to its character representation as specified by the {{lc|std::money_put}} facet of the locale currently imbued in {{c|out}}.

The insertion operation in {{c|out &lt;&lt; put_money(mon, intl)}} behaves as a {{named req|FormattedOutputFunction}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|mon|a monetary value, either {{c|long double}} or {{lc|std::basic_string}}}}
{{par|intl|use international currency strings if {{c|true}}, use currency symbols otherwise}} 
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{cpp/io/manip/iomanip return value|put_money}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iomanip&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    long double mon = 123.45; // or std::string mon = "123.45";
    
    std::cout.imbue(std::locale("en_US.UTF-8"));
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::showbase
              &lt;&lt; "en_US: " &lt;&lt; std::put_money(mon)
              &lt;&lt; " or " &lt;&lt; std::put_money(mon, true) &lt;&lt; '\n';
    
    std::cout.imbue(std::locale("ru_RU.UTF-8"));
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "ru_RU: " &lt;&lt; std::put_money(mon)
              &lt;&lt; " or " &lt;&lt; std::put_money(mon, true) &lt;&lt; '\n';
    
    std::cout.imbue(std::locale("ja_JP.UTF-8"));
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "ja_JP: " &lt;&lt; std::put_money(mon)
              &lt;&lt; " or " &lt;&lt; std::put_money(mon, true) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
en_US: $1.23 or USD  1.23
ru_RU: 1.23 руб or 1.23 RUB 
ja_JP: ￥123 or JPY  123
}}
